name: THE LORD OF THE NIGHT: Pombero Reborn
name_original: THE LORD OF THE NIGHT: Pombero Reborn
description:
Footage style first person game where you are a journalist who returns to his country in search of answers about the death of his mother. This investigation will lead him to discover his origin in a place far from the world where terror lurks.

Main features:
-Use of camera in photo and video mode with different uses.
-Use of lighter and inventory.
-Dark narrative in a hostile environment.
